translation.lead: This is a demo app showcasing how a Vue.js SPA can be built with I18n and l10n. Use the language switcher in the menu to see this site in English, Japanese, and Hebrew. After you select a language, check out the Products page.
translation.trans_disclaimer: I used Google translate to generate the Japanese and Hebrew. Sorry if either is a total wash!
translation.purpose: This app was written as a companion for a PhraseApp blog post and is released under the MIT license.
translation.blog_article: This PhraseApp blog article associated with this app
translation.retromancave: RetroManCave's Restoration: Atari Lynx Tear Down - Trash to Treasure Pt1 on YouTube
